overview: Hurray, it's Mother's Day and all the inhabitants of Sunnyville are ready to celebrate with a song and a dance! But before they can join the party, Brooklyn the lion, Peanut the giraffe and Beezbee tiny bee must answer a question: what's the best Motherâ€™s Day gift for their sweet moms? Join the party and find out in Mother's Day Dance 2!
title: Mother's Day Dance 2
